Events

In this page you will find past, recent, and upcoming STEM events happening at UCC, organized by the variety of clubs, students, and faculty at the college! Fill out this google form to upload a STEM event with a page for resources and info.


Wizprodigy Robotics Ongoing

Feb 21, 2021 - The Wizprodigy comeptition allows students to design their own robotics trucks and compete in competitions, with prizes and scholarships worth up to $2000.

British Biology Competition Completed

Feb 21, 2021 - An annual opportunity for students to test their skills in Biology, UCC is hosting its first BBO competition this year virtually.
